entries.femaleVariant: Sir, how do you respond to recent allegations that your power plant is causing people nearby to get rare disorders?
I can assure you that Petrochem acts in the best interests of every Night Citizen.
People in Arroyo are reporting memory loss, strange burn-marks... I think they'd disagree.
You know... you remind me of another journalist who ask a similar question about half a year ago.
Last I hear, she is still in a coma. Supposedly, the suspects are still at large.
You should find something more profitable to write about. How about Ziggy Q's new necktie?
Your readers will enjoy it... and you can enjoy a longer life.
